entry.name: SlideDuration
entry.label: The time over which parallax motion completes

entry.name: Zoom
entry.label: The amount by which the image is zoomed in, for the purposes of parallax motion

entry.name: Crop
entry.label: The percentage by which the sides of the image are cropped, in order for horizontal and vertical motion to be balanced

entry.name: DesktopRows
entry.label: The amount of desktop rows the workspace has
